overview: A document where Ai Asakura, who was a very ordinary girl until yesterday, has sex in public as an AV idol and releases herself. In the midst of the tension and confusion, pay attention to the sighs and obscene voiced sounds that are few words but gradually grow louder and louder! And if you are sucked into her staring, unmoving eyes, you will be captivated by her. This year's most shocking debut work! !
title: Virgin Shrine Angel Lip Debut! Ai Asakura
